title: Main Abdul Qadir Hoon
resume: Main Abdul Qadir Hoon is a Pakistani drama serial that aired on Hum TV every Saturday from December 18, 2010 to May 21, 2011. It is written by Serwat Nazir and directed by Babar Javed . Fahad Mustafa is featured in the lead role while Faisal Qureshi, Aamina Sheikh, Alishba Yousuf, Saba Hameed and Asif Raza Mir portray supporting roles. The drama started airing on December 18, 2010. It is a weekly television serial that airs every Saturday.
